snippet: The path is built of Lego-like solar panels set in concrete and protected by heavy glass.
abstract: SolaRoad, project that tests roadways as source of solar energy, starts in the Netherlands with about 230 feet of bike path, built of Lego-like solar panels set in concrete and protected by heavy glass.
lead_paragraph: The path is built of Lego-like solar panels set in concrete and protected by heavy glass.

headline.main: Solar-Energy Roadway Test Begins in the Netherlands
headline.print_headline: Solar-Energy Roadway Test Begins in the Netherlands
